author: Evelyn E. Bell
text: I’m really going to need Melody to take it down about a thousand, she literally yelled over Destiny and made no point whatsoever. Oh, she did make one point, she is NOT a good friend, lol! #LAMH

author: Evelyn E. Bell
text: WTF is wrong w/Melody? Did you catch how Maurice said that maybe the money had gotten to Marsau on the last episode, on how he used to have compassion. I think that it(money, fame) has definitely gotten to Melody, she is ridiculous. #LAMH

author: Evelyn E. Bell
text: Why is Martell so desperate? Did he even get his builder’s license yet? He has his hands in all of these random things and it’s kind of sad. #LAMH

author: Evelyn E. Bell
text: You know what I just noticed? Martell and Melody are actually more alike than you/they think, they both have no “real friends” and they like to pit other people/couples against each other. Ex, Destiny v. Tiffany v. New Chick?, Scott Bros.(Couple) v. Whitlowe Couple. #LAMH

text: I can’t twerk for sh&t, but I can “stripper thighs” all day, lol! @BlackLadySketch #BlackLadySketch

text: So far, the best Real Housewives franchise is the @rho_miami, including the reunion. It actually looks like almost everyone gets along and that there are some real friendships off camera and in real life.
